title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the Packers have clearly proven themselves to be the best team in the NFL right now after a dominating win over the Rams. He believes USC getting Lincoln Riley to be their new head coach is great for all of college football not just the PAC 12. He tells you why he was right about the Patriots and wrong about the Cowboys. Plus, Fox Sports NFL analyst Greg Olsen joins the show to discuss Tom Brady and the Buccaneers offense finding their stride in hopes of defending their Super Bowl title. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
